intheworks.title: Archive System - Complete
intheworks.text: Automatic member-based archiving and restoration system is now live. Characters follow users as they come and go from the server.

intheworks.title: Future Enhancements
intheworks.text: Exploring additional quality-of-life improvements and new features based on community feedback.

footer: I'll try to post one of these every time I start on a new feature, or when one is requested. As always, you can type $help to get a list of commands, and $help <commandname> to get more specific information on a command
